phenomenon_signatures.positive_relief: Shows as an area with a very high Sky-View Factor, particularly on its top surface, indicating it is raised and open to the sky.
phenomenon_signatures.negative_relief: Shows as an area with a very low Sky-View Factor, indicating it is a depression or trench with obscured sky visibility.
phenomenon_signatures.subtle_topographic_pattern: Reveals fine-grained patterns as a high-contrast texture of low and high SVF values.
